poem:
The Unraveling  
  
In the shadowed corridors  
of power, whispers linger,  
ties knotted tight unravel,  
webs spun unseen.  
  
Reputation's fragile dance—  
a courthouse stage,  
where echoes of choices  
in the company of ghosts  
resonate.  
  
The mirror reflects  
not the visage of past triumphs  
but the skeins of truth  
unwound.
